level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2 [ยง 2-501 et seq.], may issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary addition of provisions concerning a juvenile drug screening and treatment diversion plan, see ยง 513 of the Omnibus Criminal Code Amendments Emergency Amendment Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-599, January 14, 2013, 60 DCR 1017).
